price: 43. Este es el Infierno que los pecadores incrédulos negaban.
arabic: هَٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِي يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: hādhihi jahannamu allatī yukadhibu bihā al-muj'rimūna
